s.text: As evidence for this nationwide hysteria, the story quotes a gun shop owner in Las Vegas who's been unloading an unusually high number of gas masks and bulletproof vests (if ammo shops in Las Vegas are a reliable indicator of the country's mood, then Today's Papers is moving to Denmark).
The hijackers claim to have killed four passengers, but so far they've released only one corpse, along with three men, nine women, and 13 children.
They were foiled when French anti-terrorist commandos stormed the jet as it was parked and killed the terrorists.
